quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Game and Pokemon
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stukovs, edmund. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these is not a playable character in the video game Mario Party 4?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toad

questions.question: What does Mario use for his power shot in the game Mario Power Tennis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a hammer

questions.question: What type of unit is Zeratul?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dark Templar

questions.question: The Pokemon creature Snorunt can evolve in which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Glalie  Froslass

questions.question: What unit says that in the game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dark Templar

questions.question: What is the God Pokemon called in Pokemon Pearl and Diamond?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arceus

questions.question: In Super Mario World, you start the game on which island?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yoshis Island

questions.question: What Pokemon abducted Professor Spencer Haled in the movie Pokemon 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Unknown

questions.question: What is Alexei Stukovs rank?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vice Admiral

questions.question: What are characteristics of the Archon unit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 10 hit points and 350 plasma shield

questions.question: How many heroes are alive at the end of Startcraft: Brood War?

options.text: 6 - Artanis, Arcturus Mengsk, Jim Raynor, Zeratul, Samir Duran, Sarah Kerrigan
7 - Aratnis, Arcturus Mengsk, Aldaris, Samir Duran, Sarah Kerrigan, Fenix, Zeratul
5 - Fenix, Arcturus Mengsk, Edmund Duke, Samir Duran, Sarah Kerrigan
7 - Aratnis, Arcturus Mengsk, Aldaris, Samir Duran, Sarah Kerrigan, Fenix, Jim Raynor

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 6 - Artanis, Arcturus Mengsk, Jim Raynor, Zeratul, Samir Duran, Sarah Kerrigan

questions.question: Edmund Duke leads which group of elite fighters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alpha Squadron

questions.question: In what Pokemon version can Palkia be obtained?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pearl

questions.question: In the game Super Mario Sunshine, where is Bowser when you fight him at the end?

options.text: in the windmill with Petey Piranha

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in a hot tub

questions.question: What was the first ever ghost Pokemon to appear in a Pokemon episiode?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gengar

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fenix

questions.question: Which Age of Empires game expansion pack allows you to play as Native Americans?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The War Chiefs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True colors

questions.question: Which game is Luis Sera featured in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Resident Evil 4

questions.question: In the video game Rock Band you can play multiple instruments in the band.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In The Legend of Zelda: Majoras Mask, how many days do you have until the moon crashes down on Temina?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: three

questions.question: Who leads the UED (United Earth Directorate forces)?

questions.question: Which of these songs is not in Guitar Hero 2?

questions.question: What is the name of the Italian plumber, thats also the mascot of Nintendo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mario

questions.question: In 2007, this game was named by IGN the 3rd best GameCube game of all time.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Super Smash Bros Melee

questions.question: What does KOTOR stand for?

questions.question: In the Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess, what is the name of the first sword you get?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wooden sword

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Runescape and Game
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, detail, link. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Link, one of the main characters in the Zelda series of games, is a member of what race?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hylians

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A warrior

questions.question: What is the name of the sword used to defeat the demon in the demon slayer quest of the online role-playing game RuneScape?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Silverlight

questions.question: What island do you start on in the online role-playing game RuneScape?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tutorial Island

questions.question: What is the name of the owner of lon-lon ranch in the Zelda series of games?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Talon

questions.question: Which computer game is this soundtrack from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Double Dragon

questions.question: What is the highest weapon type available to nonmembers in the online role-playing game RuneScape?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rune

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the online role-playing game RuneScape, what kind of fruit is grown in Karajama?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bananas

questions.question: Priest robes raise your mage level in the mass online game RuneScape.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In which Zelda game does Link turn into a bunny when he goes into the dark world without a pearl?

questions.question: In the Zelda series of games, what is the name of the tribe Gannondorf comes from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gerudo

questions.question: What is Links fathers name according to the Zelda series of games?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It has never been revealed.

questions.question: In The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess, what was the name of the villain that had been fired from a joker at Hyrule Castle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: What is the name of the fantasy realm in which the RuneScape game is set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gielinor

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Game and Words
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cost, death. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What hero do these words belong to: I fear no death, I fear no enemy, our
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fenix

questions.question: In the survival video game Resident Evil 4, the handcannon with its exclusive upgrade does 99.9 damage and has infinite ammo.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The words Doom to all who threaten the homeworld belong to which unit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zealot

questions.question: What is the merchants real name in the video game Resident Evil 4?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is not mentioned

questions.question: Listen to the dialogue and determine what name is missing at the end
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alexei

questions.question: How many hit points does the Arclite Siege Tank have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 150

questions.question: Who kills the Matriarch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zeratul

questions.question: Not including the rocket launcher, what is the second most powerful weapon in Resident Evil 4, according to its damage per shot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Broken butterfly

questions.question: Whose final speech ends in We shall win through no matter the cost!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arcturus Mengsk

questions.question: What were the words of Sarah Kerrigan to Jim Raynor when they first met?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: You pig!

questions.question: Which of the guns listed is available before you beat the Resident Evil 4 game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Killer7

questions.question: What is the official version for the death of Alexei Stukov?

options.text: He commits suicide after his fleet is destroyed
He is killed by Samir Duran, because he was a traitor
His spaceship is blown up by Prottos forces
He dies during the final assault on planet Char

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He dies during the final assault on planet Char

questions.question: This creature from the game Resident Evil 4 was created by splicing genes from reptiles, insects and a human into one organism.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: U3

questions.question: The action in the survival horror game Resident Evil 4 takes place in what country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spain

questions.question: What does Traiborn call you in the online role-playing game RuneScape?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thingummywut
